## Mojo Usage

```javascript
application.use(require("mojo-react"));

var views    = require("mojo-views");

var HelloView = views.Base.extend({
  react: React.createClass({
    render: function () {
      return <h1>Hello {this.props.name}!</h1>;
    }
  })
});

var view = new HelloView({ name: "Frank" });
document.body.appendChild(view.render());
```

## React Usage

```javascript
var mojoReact = require("mojo-react"),
views         = require("mojo-views");

var HelloView = views.Base.extend({
  paper: require("./hello.pc") // <h1>Hello {{name}}!</h1>
});

var HelloReactView = mojoReact.createReactClass(HelloView);

React.renderComponent(<HelloReactView name="Craig" />, document.body);
```
